sub_title: Building ML Platforms | Engineering Manager | 👨‍🏫  University Lecturer
summary:
Everything I share or post are my own opinions and do not reflect the stance of organisations that I am affiliated with (incl. my employer).

I am lecturer in Data Mining & Data Warehousing at University of Applied Science Vienna (FH Wien), Manager Engineering & Development (previously Tech Lead for MLOps) as well as MLE Craft Lead at TMNL (Transaction Monitoring Netherlands), a worldwide unique joint venture of Dutch banks to battle money laundering and terrorism financing. Previously, I was Expert ML Engineer at bol.com and Head of AI at craftworks, a Software and AI consultancy, where I conceptualized, designed and implemented Machine/Deep Learning solutions focusing on Industrial Artificial Intelligence.

treasury_media.title: Beers with Engineers- Episode 10 - with Simon Stiebellehner

profile_positions.description:
Working across multiple engineering teams to make 1+1=5 become reality. I believe in engineering excellence, strong ownership and over-communication.

What we are doing at TMNL? In short: TMNL is a worldwide unique initiative dedicated to fighting money laundering and terrorism financing with world-class engineering, analytics and machine learning.
profile_positions.title: Manager Engineering & Development

profile_positions.description: Leading the Machine Learning Engineering craft, encompassing approximately 13 engineers placed in various product teams.
profile_positions.title: Craft Lead - Machine Learning Engineering

profile_positions.description: Started at TMNL as Lead MLOps Engineer, tasked with designing and developing our ML Platform. Also, I've been serving as Craft Lead for MLEs across model development teams.
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead MLOps

company.name: FH Campus Wien | University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.company: FH Campus Wien | University of Applied Sciences
profile_positions.description: I conceptualise, author and teach courses around Data Warehousing, Data Mining, Quantitative Methods as well as Research Principles at the University of Applied Sciences Vienna. Furthermore, I support students achieve their research goals by supervising their Master theses.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Hooray! 12 million people in the Netherlands and Belgium are shopping at bol.com. With over 2,5 million visits per day at our platform, 700 orders per minute and 21,5 million unique products bol.com is a textbook example of a big data environment.

As Machine Learning Engineer in the Customer Happiness team, I helped bol.com build software that allows for understanding its customers better through means of Machine Learning. Next to my technical duties, I mentored Data Scientists and MLEs and helped our department expand its Machine Learning capabilities in line with our business objectives. Also, I was a reviewer of the bol.com tech blog and helped organising the company-wide Data Science training programme.
profile_positions.title: Expert Machine Learning Engineer

company.name: WU (Vienna University of Economics and Business)

 - Real Time Bidding
 - Search Engine Advertising
 - Online Display Advertising
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
At craftworks, I built prize-winning Artificial Intelligence solutions for the Industry - from the Automotive to the Energy sector and everything in-between.

We used state-of-the-art Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques to solve hard problems using data, including Predictive Maintenance, Visual Inspection and many more.

Also, I conceptualized and lead the development of our very own product: navio.ai - a fully fledged Auto-ML and model deployment platform making MLOps easy. For that we used technologies such as Apache Spark, MLFlow, Docker, Python, Scala and Java.
profile_positions.title: Head of AI

profile_positions.description: Designing and implementing Machine & Deep Learning solutions end-to-end: from prototype to production.
profile_positions.title: Machine Learning Engineer

profile_positions.description: For my MSc thesis at University College London, I was working with MediaGamma, a London-based specialist company for the application of machine learning in ad-tech. My thesis was on neural probabilistic language models in hybrid filtering for mobile app user modeling.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist
